DOC.brief_summary: To study clinical features, prognostic factors and treatment outcome and to develop a possible prognostic index in skin/soft tissue primary NK/T cell lymphoma patients.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Analysis of Skin/Soft Tissue Primary NK/T Cell Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: histologically confirmed extranodal NK/T cell lymphoma primary site is skin or soft tissue involvement of upper aerodigestive tract
